title: Chrome 100 Beta marks the beginning of the end for user agent strings
content:
Google Chrome and Mozilla Firefox are both rapidly approaching version 100, which has the potential to break some websites that incorrectly check for the browser version. Both browsers have been working on possible solutions, and now Chrome 100 has arrived in the Beta Channel with changes to version reporting and other new features. Google wrote

The post Chrome 100 Beta marks the beginning of the end for user agent strings appeared first on xda-developers.
description: Google has released Chrome 100 in the Beta Channel, which includes significant changes to how browsers identify themselves to websites.
